title: Arcade event Quest Bug
body: I've played well over 20 ARURF games, yet the 2 quests I got after the first one (to get the icon) stopped getting progress after around 3 games, and no matter how i played it still wont progress. Is there something I'm doing wrong? Any help is appreciated

replies.body: Same for me,but I have never gotten progress.I have played also 20 games and won like 15,but none of the missions worked
Ahhhh it looks like the misisons you're on require you to *win* 3 matchmade games, not just play them. You do have 2/3 so far, so you're just one win away from Level 2!

But i  have won games, more than 3 i think
Edit: I just checked and I have defiitley won more than 3 match made games
